Reviews.Title: Good configuration for D5200
Reviews.Author: Fikri Atmaca
Reviews.Content: i get it as minimum configuration to use this camera more efficient. Actually, i have preferred to purchase a different configuration has additional items like memory and additional battery but unfortunately it were unavailable at that time. But this is also OK.

ProductInfo.Features:
D5200 DX-Format Red Digital SLR Kit with 18-55mm VR Lens
55-200mm f/4.5-5.6G ED AF-S VR DX Zoom-Nikkor, With Nikon 5-Year USA Warranty
Compact Deluxe Gadget Bag - DC74
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D5200 DX-Format Red Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm and 55-200mm VR Lens Bundle - Includes camera, 55-200mm NIKKOR Lens , Compact Deluxe Gadget Bag
